questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A helicopter

Where was the photo taken?
A) At an airport
B) In a park
C) In the sky
D) On a highway

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A helicopter flying
B) A plane taking off
C) A bird in flight
D) A drone hovering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The sky
B) The helicopter
C) The clouds
D) The ground

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A bird
B) A plane
C) A helicopter
D) A drone

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) A forest
C) The sky
D) Mountains

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A building
C) A helicopter
D) A person

What type of aircraft is depicted in the photo?
A) Airplane
B) Helicopter
C) Glider
D) Hot air balloon

What color is the sky in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Grey
D) Green

What is the helicopter doing?
A) Taking off
B) Landing
C) Flying
D) Hovering

What can be inferred about the weather in the photo?
A) It is cloudy
B) It is raining
C) It is clear and sunny
D) It is snowing

What is the position of the helicopter in relation to the photo?
A) Bottom left
B) Top right
C) Center
D) Bottom right

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Taken from below
B) Taken from above
C) Taken from the side
D) Taken from behind

What part of the helicopter is most visible?
A) The rotor blades and tail
B) The landing skids
C) The tail
D) The cockpit

What is the color of the helicopter?  
A) Red  
B) Blue and grey
C) Green  
D) Black

What is missing from the photo that is often present in aerial photos?
A) Clouds
B) Birds
C) Buildings
D) All of the above

How many rotor blades does the helicopter have?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the orientation of the helicopter?
A) Facing left
B) Facing right
C) Facing up
D) Facing down

What is not visible in the photo?
A) The ground and sun
B) The sky
C) The helicopter
D) The sun

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Overcast
C) Partly cloudy
D) Stormy

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From the ground looking up
B) From above looking down
C) From the side looking horizontally
D) From inside the helicopter

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright
B) Dim
C) Shadowy
D) Artificial

What is the helicopter's position relative to the horizon?
A) Above the horizon
B) Below the horizon
C) At the horizon
D) Not applicable

What is the helicopter's direction of movement?
A) Left to right
B) Right to left
C) Upward
D) Downward

What element dominates the photo?
A) The helicopter
B) The sky
C) The landscape
D) The buildings

What is the primary color of the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the perspective of the viewer in the photo?
A) Looking down
B) Looking up
C) Looking sideways
D) Looking straight ahead

What is the helicopter's rotor blade configuration?
A) Single rotor
B) Dual rotor
C) Quad rotor
D) Hexa rotor

What is the visibility like in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Foggy
C) Hazy
D) Smoky

What is the sky's color tone in the photo?
A) Dark blue
B) Light blue
C) Greyish blue
D) Greenish blue

What is the helicopter's landing gear type?
A) Skids
B) Wheels
C) Floats
D) None

What is the photo's orientation?
A) Landscape
B) Portrait
C) Square
D) Panoramic

What is the helicopter's tail rotor configuration?
A) Single rotor
B) Dual rotor
C) No tail rotor
D) Quad rotor

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) Trees
B) People
C) A helicopter
D) Buildings

What is the relationship between the helicopter and the sky?
A) The helicopter is on the ground
B) The helicopter is flying in the sky
C) The helicopter is parked
D) The helicopter is taking off

What is the weather like in the photo?
A) Stormy
B) Clear
C) Foggy
D) Rainy

How many helicopters are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

Is there any visible ground in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No
